data.name: Weiss Weiss Baby
data.description: All right stop, collaborate and listen…Inspired by the German roots of the Dietenhofers, and their love of early 1990s hip-hop lyrics, Weiss Weiss Baby is a light-bodied filtered Crystal Weiss beer filled with aromas of tropical fruit and notes of fresh cut grass with a spicy finish. Enjoy this refreshing beer on a warm summer day.

available.name: Seasonal
available.description: Available at the same time of year, every year.

style.name: South German-Style Kristall Weizen / Kristall Weissbier
style.description: The aroma and flavor of a Weissbier without yeast is very similar to Weissbier with yeast (Hefeweizen/Hefeweissbier) with the caveat that fruity and phenolic characters are not combined with the yeasty flavor and fuller-bodied mouthfeel of yeast. The phenolic characteristics are often described as clove- or nutmeg-like and can be smoky or even vanilla-like. Banana-like esters are often present. These beers are made with at least 50 percent malted wheat, and hop rates are quite low. Hop flavor and aroma are absent. Weissbier is well attenuated and very highly carbonated, yet its relatively high starting gravity and alcohol content make it a medium- to full-bodied beer. The color is very pale to deep golden. Because the beer has been filtered, yeast is not present. The beer will have no flavor of yeast and a cleaner, drier mouthfeel. The beer should be clear with no chill haze present. No diacetyl should be perceived.

breweries.name: Figueroa Mountain Brewing
breweries.description: Figueroa Mountain Brewing Co. was founded by father and son team, Jim and Jaime Dietenhofer, in 2010.  With a passion for craft beer, they set out to pay homage to the beautiful Santa Ynez Valley with handcrafted beer and hand-drawn artwork depicting the local landscape on their labels.  There are currently five taprooms along California’s Central Coast and one taproom set to open in Westlake Village late summer 2015.  Figueroa Mountain Brewing Co. beer can be found in their taprooms or at select retailers and restaurants throughout California.  Learn more about @FigMtnBrew or where to find their beer at www.FigMtnBrew.com.

data.name: Weisser Engel Hefe-Weissbier
data.description: Ein himmlischer Genuss mit weisser Krone. Ein St.Galler Bier mit bayerischer Seele. Der Weisse Engel ist ein echtes, naturtrübes Weissbier, gebraut nach dem bayerischen Reinheitsgebot von 1516. Seinen typischen und feinen Geschmack verdankt dieses Weizenbier hochwertigen Rohstoffen, wie feinstem Weizenmalz und der Gärung mit reingezüchteter, obergäriger Bierhefe.

data.name: Weizen-Radler alkoholfrei
data.description:
A 100-year-old innovation

About 100 years ago enjoyed a drink of very popular which was mixed equal parts of wheat beer and lemonade. This wheat refreshment is today more and more friends. And because we maintain successful traditions since time immemorial, we have picked up this old idea, evolving to a modern wheat mixed drink.

The popular Krombacher wheat ensures our fresh new interpretation of the classic the full-bodied taste. The perfect complement to make the lemonade tailored to the fruity taste of wheat. So combine the two components to a mature, full-bodied, fresh taste. Krombacher Radler of wheat - are also non-alcoholic BB´s.

breweries.name: Krombacher Gruppe
breweries.description:
The brewery was founded on 4 February 1803 by John Haas. His father, Johann Eberhard Haas chatted in Krombach an inn. As for a Regulation of 25 July 1618 serving of beer was only allowed if the restaurant also had its own brewery and a malt kiln, John Haas set up a brewery in the family business. 

The water for the brewery ("Hasbrauerei") they picked first in barrels from a spring at the foot of the Grumbergs in the west of the village by bullock carts to brewery. 1854 had a brewery owner Haas church annual 17 Gulden (Florin) pay rent that the water pipeline was conducted on church land to the village.

data.name: Welde Weizen Kristall
data.description: Welde Weizen Kristall has a warm, golden-yellow color and is crowned by a notably stable, fine-pored foam. Its fresh scent is rounded off with a fine, sourly-fruity note with a hint of banana. A fresh first sip gives way to a pleasantly dry aftertaste.

available.name: Year Round
available.description: Available year round as a staple beer.

style.name: South German-Style Kristall Weizen / Kristall Weissbier

breweries.name: Weldebräu GmbH & Co. KG
breweries.description: Welde represents authentic, independent brewing and the pleasure of exclusive beer. For over 260 years, our brewery in Baden has used the best raw materials, traditional craftsmanship and innovative ideas to create first-rate beers. Beers as they should be: perfectly crafted and with a unique taste.
